# isCancelled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the work item has been canceled.

## Declaration

```swift
var isCancelled: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the work item has been canceled.

## Canceling a Work Item

- **cancel()**: Cancels the current work item asynchronously.
